resources.string: wiser
System Auto Test started.
%%s %%s has run out of battery. Replace the batteries.
%%s %%s is not responding, please check the power supply or wireless communication.
Your hot water tank has been off for at least 24 hours.
The temperature in %%s is below %%s\u00B0C. Your goods are in danger. Check that outside windows and doors are closed and that your heating installation is running.
Heating performance issue detected in %%s. Please ensure that windows are closed and heater not covered.
%%s : The electricity consumption is very high. Turn off one or more appliances to reduce risk of losing all power.
Shedding activated for %%s due to risk of circuit breaker tripping.
System Auto Test result - passed: %%s , failed: %%s.
Your hot water tank has been turned on again.
Power usage no longer high.
The temperature in %%s is no longer below %%s\u00B0C.
Heating performance issue in %%s solved.
Significant drop in temperature detected at %%s %%s.
Temperature setpoint restored at %%s %%s.
Shedding deactivated for %%s.
Off-peak period started.
Peak period started.
%%s is back online.
